mapper.select: SELECT c.commentid AS 'commentid', c.post_postid AS 'post_postid', c.commentcontent AS 'commentcontent', c.target_parent AS 'target_parent', c.isdelete AS 'isdelete', c.date AS 'date', c.depth AS 'depth', u.userid AS 'user_userid', u.username AS 'username', u.profileimg AS 'profileimg' FROM comment AS c JOIN user AS u ON c.user_userid = u.userid where c.post_postid = #{param1} order by target_parent asc, commentid asc;
select commentcontent from comment where commentid=#{param1};
mapper.insert: insert into report(reporttype, targetid, user_userid, title, userid, originpostid) values(#{reporttype}, #{targetid}, #{user_userid}, #{title}, #{userid}, #{originpostid});
